mapper.update: update temp_user as u left join temp_duty as d on u.duty_id = d.duty_id set u.authority_code = case when d.duty_name not like '%장' and d.duty_name != '대표' then 'A1' when d.duty_name like '%장' then 'A2' when d.duty_name = '대표' then 'A2' when d.duty_name is null then 'A3' end;
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, pos_id, duty_id, dept_id, authority_code from temp_user where user_id not in (select user_id from user)
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_password, user_name, pos_id, duty_id, dept_id, authority_code, current_state, flag) select user_id, user_id, user_name, pos_id, duty_id, dept_id, authority_code, '재직', '인사연동' from temp_user where user_id not in (select user_id from user)
mapper.update: update user set current_state = '퇴직' where flag = '인사연동' and user_id not in (select user_id from temp_user) or user_id = any(select user_id from temp_user where current_state = '퇴직');
